Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision16Camera.name: CameraErrorBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision16Camera.abstract: Block that will be executed if an error occurs on the camera. It contains a camera specific error.

Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision18Camera.name: CameraSuccessBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision18Camera.abstract: Block that will be executed when the camera successfully takes a picture. It contains the JPEG representation of the image including meta information about the image.

Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision24Camera.name: CameraScreenFailureBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision24Camera.abstract: Block that will be executed if an error occurs on the camera screen.

Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision24Camera.name: CameraScreenSuccessBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision24Camera.abstract: Block that will be executed when the camera screen successfully takes a picture or pick a document/picture. It contains the JPEG representation of the image including meta information about the image, or the PDF Data. It also contains if the document has been imported from camera-roll/document-explorer or from the camera.

Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision12Notice.name: NoticeAction
Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision12Notice.abstract: Block that will be executed when a notice is tapped. Can be used to restart a process or to give the user further guidance.

Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision16Review.name: ReviewErrorBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision16Review.abstract: Block that will be executed when an error occurs on the review screen. It contains a review specific error.

Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision18Review.name: ReviewSuccessBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision18Review.abstract: Block that will be executed each time the user rotates a picture. It contains the JPEG representation of the image including meta information about the rotated image.

Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision24Review.name: ReviewScreenFailureBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision24Review.abstract: Block that will be executed if an error occurs on the review screen.

Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision24Review.name: ReviewScreenSuccessBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:10GiniVision24Review.abstract: Block that will be executed each time the user rotates a picture. It contains the JPEG representation of the image including meta information about the rotated image. In the case of a PDF, it should proceed to analysis screen once it has been validated.

Structs/GiniVisionFont.html.name: GiniVisionFont
Structs/GiniVisionFont.html.abstract: Provides a way to set all possible font weights used in the GiniVision library.

Protocols/GiniVisionDocument.html#/s:10G.name: validate()
Protocols/GiniVisionDocument.html#/s:10G.abstract: Validates a document. The validation process is done in the global DispatchQueue.

Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: didCapture(document:)
Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the user has taken a picture or imported a file (image or PDF) from camera roll or document explorer

Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: didCapture(_:)
Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the user has taken an image.

Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: didReview(document:withChanges:)
Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the user has reviewed the image and potentially rotated it to the correct orientation.

Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: didReview(_:withChanges:)
Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the user has reviewed the image and potentially rotated it to the correct orientation.

Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: didCancelCapturing()
Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the user cancels capturing on the camera screen. Should be used to dismiss the presented view controller.

Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: didCancelReview()
Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the user navigates back from the review screen to the camera potentially to retake an image. Should be used to cancel any ongoing analysis task on the image.

Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: didShowAnalysis(_:)
Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the user is presented with the analsis screen. Use the analysisDelegate object to inform the user about the current status of the analysis task.

Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: didCancelAnalysis()
Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the user navigates back from the analysis screen to the review screen. Should be used to cancel any ongoing analysis task on the image.

Protocols/AnalysisDelegate.html#/c:@M@Gi.name: displayError(withMessage:andAction:)
Protocols/AnalysisDelegate.html#/c:@M@Gi.abstract: Will display an error view on the analysis screen with a custom message.

Protocols/AnalysisDelegate.html#/c:@M@Gi.name: tryDisplayNoResultsScreen()
Protocols/AnalysisDelegate.html#/c:@M@Gi.abstract: In case that the GiniVisionDocument analysed is an image it will display a no results screen

Protocols/AnalysisDelegate.html.name: AnalysisDelegate
Protocols/AnalysisDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate which can be used to communicate back to the analysis screen allowing to display custom messages on screen.

Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html.name: GiniVisionDelegate
Protocols/GiniVisionDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate to inform the reveiver about the current status of the Gini Vision Library.

Enums/FilePickerError.html#/s:10GiniVisi.name: photoLibraryAccessDenied
Enums/FilePickerError.html#/s:10GiniVisi.abstract: Camera roll can not be loaded because the user has denied authorization in the past.

Enums/CameraError.html#/s:10GiniVision11.name: notAuthorizedToUseDevice
Enums/CameraError.html#/s:10GiniVision11.abstract: Camera can not be loaded because the user has denied authorization in the past.

Enums/CameraError.html#/s:10GiniVision11.name: noInputDevice
Enums/CameraError.html#/s:10GiniVision11.abstract: No valid input device could be found for capturing.

Enums/CameraError.html.name: CameraError
Enums/CameraError.html.abstract: Errors thrown on the camera screen or during camera initialization.

Enums/DocumentValidationError.html.name: DocumentValidationError
Enums/DocumentValidationError.html.abstract: Errors thrown validating a document (image or pdf).

Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/s:10G.name: init(_:successBlock:failureBlock:)
Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/s:10G.abstract: Designated initializer for the ReviewViewController which allows to set a success block and an error block which will be executed accordingly.

Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/s:10G.name: init(_:success:failure:)
Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/s:10G.abstract: Convenience initializer for the ReviewViewController which allows to set a success block and an error block which will be executed accordingly.

Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: init(coder:)
Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: viewDidLayoutSubviews()
Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called to notify the view controller that its view has just laid out its subviews.

Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: viewDidAppear(_:)
Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Notifies the view controller that its view was added to a view hierarchy.

Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@CM.name: viewForZooming(in:)
Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Asks the delegate for the view to scale when zooming is about to occur in the scroll view.

Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@CM.name: scrollViewDidZoom(_:)
Classes/ReviewViewController.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Informs the delegate that the scroll view’s zoom factor has changed.

Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.name: scrollView
Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.abstract: Scroll view used to display different onboarding pages.

Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.name: pages
Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.abstract: Array of views displayed as pages inside the scroll view.

Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.name: init(pages:scrollViewDelegate:)
Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.abstract: Designated intitializer for the OnboardingViewController which allows to pass a custom set of views which will be displayed in horizontal scroll view.

Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.name: init(scrollViewDelegate:)
Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.abstract: Convenience initializer for the OnboardingViewController which will set a predefined set of views as the onboarding pages.

Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.name: init(coder:)
Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.name: scrollToNextPage(_:)
Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.abstract: Scrolls the scroll view to the next page.

Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.name: centerTo(page:)
Classes/OnboardingViewController.html#/c.abstract: Center page in case it is not centered (i.e after rotation)

Classes/OnboardingPage.html#/c:@M@GiniVi.name: init(image:text:rotateImageInLandscape:)
Classes/OnboardingPage.html#/c:@M@GiniVi.abstract: Designated initializer for the OnboardingPage class which allows to create a custom onboarding page just by passing an image and a text. The text will be displayed underneath the image.

Classes/OnboardingPage.html#/c:@M@GiniVi.name: init(imageNamed:text:rotateImageInLandscape:)
Classes/OnboardingPage.html#/c:@M@GiniVi.abstract: Convenience initializer for the OnboardingPage class which allows to create a custom onboarding page simply by passing an image name and a text. The text will be displayed underneath the image.

Classes/OnboardingPage.html#/c:@M@GiniVi.name: init(coder:)
Classes/OnboardingPage.html#/c:@M@GiniVi.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/GiniVision.html#/c:@M@GiniVision.name: setConfiguration(_:)
Classes/GiniVision.html#/c:@M@GiniVision.abstract: Sets a configuration which is used to customize the look and feel of the Gini Vision Library,

Classes/GiniVision.html#/c:@M@GiniVision.name: viewController(withDelegate:importedDocument:)
Classes/GiniVision.html#/c:@M@GiniVision.abstract: Returns a navigation view controller with the camera screen loaded and ready to go. It’s the easiest way to get started with the Gini Vision Library as it comes pre-configured and handles all screens and transitions out of the box.

Classes/GiniVision.html#/c:@M@GiniVision.name: viewController(withDelegate:withConfiguration:importedDocument:)
Classes/GiniVision.html#/c:@M@GiniVision.abstract: Returns a navigation view controller with the camera screen loaded and ready to go. Allows to set a custom configuration to change the look and feel of the Gini Vision Library.

Classes/GiniVision.html#/c:@M@GiniVision.name: versionString
Classes/GiniVision.html#/c:@M@GiniVision.abstract: Returns the current version of the Gini Vision Library.

Classes/GiniPDFDocument.html#/c:@M@GiniV.name: checkType()
Classes/GiniPDFDocument.html#/c:@M@GiniV.abstract: Check pdf document type. It should have less than 10 pages.

Classes/GiniImageDocument.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: checkType()
Classes/GiniImageDocument.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Check image document type. It should be a PNG, JPEG, GIF or TIFF.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: debugModeOn
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Can be turned on during development to unlock extra information and to save captured images to camera roll.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: backgroundColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the background color in all screens of the Gini Vision Library to the specified color.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/s:10Gini.name: customFont
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/s:10Gini.abstract: Sets the font used in the GiniVision library by default.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarTintColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the tint color of the navigation bar in all screens of the Gini Vision Library to the globally specified color or to a default color.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarItemTintColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the tint color of all navigation items in all screens of the Gini Vision Library to the globally specified color.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarItemFont
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the font of all navigation items in all screens of the Gini Vision Library to the globally specified font or a default font.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarTitleColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the title color in the navigation bar in all screens of the Gini Vision Library to the globally specified color or to a default color.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarTitleFont
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the title font in the navigation bar in all screens of the Gini Vision Library to the globally specified font or to a default font.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: noticeInformationBackgroundColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the background color of an informal notice. Notices are small pieces of information appearing underneath the navigation bar.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: noticeInformationTextColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text color of an informal notice. Notices are small pieces of information appearing underneath the navigation bar.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: noticeErrorBackgroundColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the background color of an error notice. Notices are small pieces of information appearing underneath the navigation bar.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: noticeErrorTextColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text color of an error notice. Notices are small pieces of information appearing underneath the navigation bar.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: noticeFont
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the font of all notices. Notices are small pieces of information appearing underneath the navigation bar.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: documentValidationErrorGeneral
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the message text of a general document validation error, shown in camera screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: documentValidationErrorExcedeedFileSize
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the message text of a document validation error dialog when a file size is higher than 10MB

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: documentValidationErrorTooManyPages
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the message text of a document validation error dialog when a pdf length is higher than 10 pages

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: documentValidationErrorWrongFormat
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the message text of a document validation error dialog when a file has a wrong format (neither PDF, JPEG, GIF, TIFF or PNG)

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/s:10Gini.name: customDocumentValidations
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/s:10Gini.abstract: Sets custom validations that can be done apart from the default ones (file size, file type…). It should throw a DocumentValidationError.custom(message) error.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/s:10Gini.name: fileImportSupportedTypes
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/s:10Gini.abstract: Set the types supported by the file import feature. GiniVisionImportFileTypes.none by default

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarCameraTitle
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the title text in the navigation bar on the camera screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarCameraTitleCloseButton
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the close button text in the navigation bar on the camera screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarCameraTitleHelpButton
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the help button text in the navigation bar on the camera screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: cameraCaptureButtonTitle
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text for the accessibility label of the capture button which allows the user to capture an image of a document.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: photoLibraryAccessDeniedMessageText
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the descriptional text when photo library access was denied, advising the user to authorize the photo library access in the settings application.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: cameraNotAuthorizedText
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the descriptional text when camera access was denied, advising the user to authorize the camera in the settings application.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: cameraNotAuthorizedTextFont
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the font of the descriptional text when camera access was denied.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: cameraNotAuthorizedTextColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text color of the descriptional text when camera access was denied.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: cameraNotAuthorizedButtonTitle
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the button title when camera access was denied, clicking the button will open the settings application.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: cameraNotAuthorizedButtonFont
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the font of the button title when camera access was denied.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: cameraNotAuthorizedButtonTitleColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text color of the button title when camera access was denied.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: cameraPreviewCornerGuidesColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of camera preview corner guides

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: fileImportToolTipBackgroundColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the background color of the new file import button hint

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: fileImportToolTipTextColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text color of the new file import button hint

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: fileImportToolTipCloseButtonColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text color of the new file import button hint

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: openWithEnabled
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Indicates whether the open with feature is enabled or not. In case of true,

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarOnboardingTitle
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the title text in the navigation bar on the onboarding screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarOnboardingTitleContinueButton
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the continue button text in the navigation bar on the onboarding screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingPageIndicatorColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the page controller’s page indicator items.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingCurrentPageIndicatorColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the page controller’s current page indicator item.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingShowAtLaunch
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Indicates whether the onboarding screen should be presented at each start of the Gini Vision Library.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingShowAtFirstLaunch
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Indicates whether the onboarding screen should be presented at the first start of the Gini Vision Library. It is advised to do so.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingFirstPageText
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text on the first onboarding page.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingSecondPageText
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text on the second onboarding page.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingThirdPageText
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text on the third onboarding page.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingFourthPageText
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text on the fourth onboarding page. (It is the first on iPad)

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingTextFont
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the font of the text for all onboarding pages.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingTextColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color ot the text for all onboarding pages.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: onboardingPages
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: All onboarding pages which will be presented in a horizontal scroll view to the user. By default the Gini Vision Library comes with three pages advising the user to keep the document flat, hold the device parallel and capture the whole document.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarReviewTitle
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the title text in the navigation bar on the review screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarReviewTitleBackButton
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the back button text in the navigation bar on the review screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarReviewTitleCloseButton
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the close button text in the navigation bar on the review screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarReviewTitleContinueButton
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the continue button text in the navigation bar on the review screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: reviewTextTop
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text appearing at the top of the review screen which should ask the user if the whole document is in focus and has correct orientation.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: reviewTextTopFont
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: The text at the top of the review screen is displayed as a notice and can not be set individually.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: reviewRotateButtonTitle
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text for the accessibility label of the rotate button which allows the user to rotate the docuent into reading direction.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: reviewDocumentImageTitle
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text for the accessibility label of the document image view.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: reviewBottomViewBackgroundColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the background color of the bottom section on the review screen containing the rotation button.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: reviewTextBottom
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text appearing at the bottom of the review screen which should encourage the user to check sharpness by double-tapping the image.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: reviewTextBottomFont
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the font of the text appearing at the bottom of the review screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: reviewTextBottomColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the text appearing at the bottom of the review screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarAnalysisTitle
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the title text in the navigation bar on the analysis screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: navigationBarAnalysisTitleBackButton
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the back button text in the navigation bar on the analysis screen.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: analysisLoadingIndicatorColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the loading indicator on the analysis screen to the specified color.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: analysisLoadingText
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text of the loading indicator on the analysis screen to the specified text.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: analysisPDFInformationBackgroundColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the PDF information view on the analysis screen to the specified color.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: analysisPDFInformationTextColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the PDF information view on the analysis screen to the specified color.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: analysisPDFNumberOfPages(pagesCount:)
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text appearing at the top of the analysis screen indicating pdf number of pages

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: supportedFormatsIconColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the supported formats icon background to the specified color.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: nonSupportedFormatsIconColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the unsupported formats icon background to the specified color.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: stepIndicatorColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the step indicator for the Open with tutorial

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: openWithAppNameForTexts
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the text of the app name for the Open with tutorial texts

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: noResultsWarningContainerIconColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the warning container background to the specified color

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: noResultsBottomButtonColor
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Sets the color of the bottom button to the specified color

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.name: init()
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html#/c:@M@Gin.abstract: Returns a GiniConfiguration instance which allows to set individual configurations to change the look and feel of the Gini Vision Library.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/s:10G.name: init(successBlock:failureBlock:)
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/s:10G.abstract: Designated initializer for the CameraViewController which allows to set a success block and an error block which will be executed accordingly.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/s:10G.name: init(success:failure:)
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/s:10G.abstract: Convenience initializer for the CameraViewController which allows to set a success block and an error block which will be executed accordingly.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: init(coder:)
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: viewWillAppear(_:)
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Notifies the view controller that its view is about to be added to a view hierarchy.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: viewWillDisappear(_:)
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Notifies the view controller that its view is about to be removed from a view hierarchy.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: showCaptureButton()
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Show the capture button. Should be called when onboarding is dismissed.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: hideCaptureButton()
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Hide the capture button. Should be called when onboarding is presented.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: showCameraOverlay()
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Show the camera overlay. Should be called when onboarding is dismissed.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: hideCameraOverlay()
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Hide the camera overlay. Should be called when onboarding is presented.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: showFileImportTip()
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Show the fileImportTip. Should be called when onboarding is dismissed.

Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.name: hideFileImportTip()
Classes/CameraViewController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Hide the fileImportTip. Should be called when onboarding is presented.

Classes/AnalysisViewController.html#/c:@.name: init(coder:)
Classes/AnalysisViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/AnalysisViewController.html#/c:@.name: showAnimation()
Classes/AnalysisViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Displays a loading activity indicator. Should be called when document analysis is started.

Classes/AnalysisViewController.html#/c:@.name: hideAnimation()
Classes/AnalysisViewController.html#/c:@.abstract: Hides the loading activity indicator. Should be called when document analysis is finished.

Classes/AnalysisViewController.html.name: AnalysisViewController
Classes/AnalysisViewController.html.abstract: The AnalysisViewController provides a custom analysis screen which shows the upload and analysis activity. The user should have the option of canceling the process by navigating back to the review screen.

Classes/CameraViewController.html.name: CameraViewController
Classes/CameraViewController.html.abstract: The CameraViewController provides a custom camera screen which enables the user to take a photo of a document to be analyzed. The user can focus the camera manually if the auto focus does not work.

Classes/GiniConfiguration.html.name: GiniConfiguration
Classes/GiniConfiguration.html.abstract: The GiniConfiguration class allows customizations to the look and feel of the Gini Vision Library. If there are limitations regarding which API can be used, this is clearly stated for the specific attribute.

Classes/GiniVision.html.name: GiniVision
Classes/GiniVision.html.abstract: Convenience class to interact with the Gini Vision Library.

Classes/HelpMenuViewController.html.name: HelpMenuViewController
Classes/HelpMenuViewController.html.abstract: The HelpMenuViewController provides explanations on how to take better pictures, how to use the open with feature and which formats are supported by Gini Vision Library.

Classes/ImageAnalysisNoResultsViewContro.name: ImageAnalysisNoResultsViewController
Classes/ImageAnalysisNoResultsViewContro.abstract: The ImageAnalysisNoResultsViewController provides a custom no results screen which shows some capture suggestions when there is no results when analysing an image.

Classes/OnboardingPage.html.name: OnboardingPage
Classes/OnboardingPage.html.abstract: Custom view to easily create onboarding pages which can then be used in OnboardingViewController. Simply pass an image and a name. Both will be beautifully aligned and displayed to the user.

Classes/OnboardingViewController.html.name: OnboardingViewController
Classes/OnboardingViewController.html.abstract: The OnboardingViewController provides a custom onboarding screen which presents some introductory screens to the user on how to get the camera in a perfect position etc. By default, three screens are pre-configured.

Classes/ReviewViewController.html.name: ReviewViewController
Classes/ReviewViewController.html.abstract: The ReviewViewController provides a custom review screen. The user has the option to check for blurriness and document orientation. If the result is not satisfying, the user can either return to the camera screen or rotate the photo by steps of 90 degrees. The photo should be uploaded to Gini’s backend immediately after having been taken as it is safe to assume that in most cases the photo is good enough to be processed further.
